DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate post-operative pain single-incision laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( SILC ) versus conventional four port technique ( LC ) . The investigator hypothesize SILC non-inferior post-operative pain .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Pain Single-incision Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Versus Conventional Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: presence symptomatic gallstone American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score 1 2 informed consent active acute cholecystitis previous open upper abdominal surgery bleeding disorder
